about_the_game:
🎉 Get Ready for Non-Stop Party Fun!

Turn any gathering into an instant party! Play Together: Lite is a fast, fun, and easy-to-learn multiplayer game where friends and family can laugh, compete, and play together—anytime, anywhere!

🔥 6 Addictive Party Games 🔥

Jump into six thrilling mini-games, each offering a unique mix of skill, strategy, and fun:

  • Knockout – Push, dodge, and survive! Stay on the platform while sending your rivals flying!

  • Animatch – Reflexes win the round! Spot and match the correct character before your opponents!

  • Punchline – A battle of wits! Come up with the funniest response and claim victory!

  • Ship Shapes – Draw fast, think faster! Complete patterns before the ship sinks!

  • Brain Battle – Outsmart your friends! Deduce the right answers and race to victory!

  • Word Connect – Teamwork is key! Solve the challenge grid together—think fast, win together!

🎮 Play with your Phone as a Controller

No extra controllers needed! Everyone joins the game using their own smartphone with Play Together: Lite, available for free on iOS and Android.

✅ Host matches on PC, tablet, or TV.
✅ Players join instantly by scanning a QR code or entering a room code.
✅ Perfect for parties and get-togethers!

📺 Remote Play with Friends

Not in the same place? No problem! Use Discord, Steam Broadcast, or any streaming platform to share your screen and play with friends no matter where they are!

🎥 Stream your game in real-time.
📱 Friends join instantly from their phone.

🌍 Supported Languages

Currently available in:

✅ English
✅ Portuguese (Brazil)
✅ Spanish (Latam)

More languages coming soon! Let us know your preferred language.

🎉 Join Our Community

Get involved with other players, suggest new mini-games, and stay up-to-date with future updates by joining our Discord server.

💖 Wishlist Now & Support Us!

Help us bring the party to even more players! Add Play Together: Lite to your Steam Wishlist and stay tuned for new mini-games and exciting updates!

🛒 Add Play Together: Lite to your Steam Wishlist today!

🎈 Try It for Free—Endless Party Fun Awaits!

Try it for FREE and bring the fun anywhere! Play Together: Lite is the perfect party starter, whether you're playing on the couch with friends or connecting remotely. Laugh, create chaos, and make epic memories! 🚀🎉

name: Play Together: Lite

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750-Ti / AMD RX 550, 2GB VRam
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580, 4GB VRam / Intel Arc A380
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: 👥 Play together, wherever you are! A party game for 2-8 players, using your phones as controllers. Play action, strategy, and board games with friends and family—locally or remotely! Wishlist now!
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
